document.full_text: violence broke out after a rally for palestinian unity in the gaza strip on tuesday when hamas supporters beat other participants with clubs, witnesses said, though the islamist group denied being behind any violence.
document.title: palestinian unity rally in gaza ends in violence
lines_and_colors: violence broke out after a rally for palestinian unity in the gaza strip on tuesday when hamas supporters beat other participants with clubs, witnesses said, though the islamist group denied being behind any violence.
